project_descr: Developing Capacity for Promoting Peace and Development

outputs.output_descr: The programme will focus on government's ongoing work around building cohesive and caring communities; and promoting peace and mutual understanding through policy review, advocacy, and capacity building in peace building and peace keeping both at national and regional levels.  This area of support is expected to contribute to the National Outcomes on: the creation of better South Africa, a better Africa, and a better world, and all people in South Africa are and feel safe.

project_title: developing capacity for promoting peace and development
